english.segment1: Who was and is and is to come. the Savior, Redeemer the Father the Son. His Spirit is on me a fire within, Creator, Sustainer, Beginning and End.
english.segment3: You are everything I will ever need, To complete everything You are asking of me.
english.segment4: I﻿ lay it all down for the sake of Your Name, Here﻿ I am God, Use me, set me aflame!
english.segment5: The GREAT I AM (x8). You are dancing and singing the Fathers song(x3). You're rejoicing over me(repeat)
english.segment6: . You are a good good Daddy (x3). You're rejoicing over me(repeat)
